roleset.name: take a risk
roleset.note: HAZARD-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: bet (94). Edited by hwangd. Adjectival 'hazardous' found in BOLT-7. (from hazard.01-v)

example.name: hazard-v: All args
example.text: As it was, however, she only hazarded a hint.

roleset.name: risky
roleset.note: HAZARDOUS-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from hazardous.01-j)

example.name: hazardous-j
example.text: Against a real - life backdrop formed by these sorts of phenomenon , it appears that interpersonal relationships are " mutually hazardous to one other " . Everyone experiences more or less a sense of insecurity .
